original_text:
Big Max 77
Big Max 77 è stato da poco lanciato dalla software house Swintt per i nostri lettori appassionati di slot machine a tema Frutta. Quindi, resta sintonizzato su questa pagina per scoprire tutti i dettagli tecnici di questo gioco disponibile in demo sul nostro sito.
Caratteristiche di gioco di Big Max 77
Big Max 77 è una slot machine con rulli 5×3 e 10 linee vincenti attive. La percentuale di ritorno al giocatore (RTP) sembra essere piuttosto soddisfacente al 97,01% con una volatilità alta. È possibile vincere fino a 5.000 volte la scommessa.
L’avventurosa slot Big Max 77 ha una puntata minima di 0,10€, ma ogni round potrebbe richiedere una scommessa fino a 100€, a seconda di quanto è alta la posta in gioco. Se giudichiamo la slot machine dal tema e dai simboli che compaiono sui suoi 5 rulli, possiamo dire che si tratta della classica slot Frutta, ma grazie alle funzioni extra, la musica cambia radicalmente…
Grafica, Simboli e Funzionalità Speciali di Big Max 77
Come ti abbiamo già anticipato, Big Max 77 è una slot a tema frutta progettata in stile vecchia scuola, che ti riporta ai tempi delle classiche slot machine nei casinò terrestri. La grafica è minimalista senza alcuna animazione aggiuntiva che forse, avrebbe reso il gameplay più dinamico e avvincente.
Detto questo, i frutti sono i veri protagonisti. Pertanto, sulla normale tabella dei pagamenti della slot troverai ciliegie, arance, uva, limoni, prugne e angurie. Inoltre, c’è un 7 rosso scarlatto in grado di dare il premio più alto della slot.
L’unico simbolo speciale è lo Scatter, rappresentato da una fiamma ardente. Le vincite scatter in Big Max 77 sono indipendenti dalle linee di pagamento fisse.
La funzione extra disponibile in questo gioco è denominata Gamble e ti consente di indovinare il colore della carta. Puoi giocare fino a 10 giochi contemporaneamente in attesa del tuo colpo fortunato!

Domande Frequenti 
Posso giocare da mobile a Big Max 77?

Certo, anche in viaggio, c'è un'opportunità che ti aspetta utilizzando il tuo dispositivo mobile o tablet. Grazie a tecnologie come HTML5 e JavaScript, puoi avviare questa slot machine nel tuo browser mobile e goderti un’esperienza fluida ovunque tu vada.



Qual è il simbolo più prezioso in Big Max 77?

Il simbolo più prezioso nella slot machine Big Max 77 è il simbolo Scatter che paga indipendentemente dalle linee di pagamento.



Devo effettuare un deposito per giocare a questo gioco?

Sì, ma solo se giochi a Big Max 77 in uno dei nostri casinò con soldi veri. Altrimenti, puoi goderti la nostra versione demo gratuita e provare solo per divertimento.

raw_translation.response:
Big Max 77

Experience the thrill of Big Max 77, Swintt's latest release for our passionate fruit-themed slot machine enthusiasts. Stay tuned to this page and discover all the technical details of this game, available for demo play on our site.

Game Features of Big Max 77

Big Max 77 is a 5x3 reel slot machine with 10 active paylines. The return to player (RTP) percentage seems to be quite satisfactory at 97.01%, with high volatility. It is possible to win up to 5,000 times your bet.

This adventurous slot game has a minimum bet of €0.10, but each round could require a bet up to €100, depending on the stakes at play. Judging by the game's theme and symbols appearing on its 5 reels, we can say that it is a classic fruit slot machine. However, thanks to its extra features, the music changes drastically...

Graphics, Symbols, and Special Features of Big Max 77

As we've previously mentioned, Big Max 77 is a fruit-themed slot machine designed in an old-school style that takes you back to classic slot machines in land-based casinos. The graphics are minimalist, without any additional animations that could possibly make the gameplay more dynamic and engaging.

That being said, the fruits are the real stars. Therefore, on the standard paytable of the slot, you will find cherries, oranges, grapes, lemons, plums, and watermelons. Furthermore, there is a scarlet red 7 capable of awarding the highest prize of the slot game.

The only special symbol is the Scatter, represented by a blazing flame. Scatter wins in Big Max 77 are independent of fixed paylines.

The extra feature available in this game is called Gamble, which allows you to guess the color of a card. You can play up to 10 games at the same time while waiting for Lady Luck to strike!

Frequently Asked Questions

Can I play Big Max 77 on mobile?

Certainly! Even on-the-go, there is an opportunity waiting for you using your mobile device or tablet. Thanks to technologies such as HTML5 and JavaScript, you can launch this slot machine in your mobile browser and enjoy a seamless experience wherever you go.

What is the most valuable symbol in Big Max 77?

The most valuable symbol in the Big Max 77 slot machine is the Scatter symbol, which pays regardless of fixed paylines.

Do I need to make a deposit to play this game?

Yes, but only if you're playing Big Max 77 at one of our real money casinos. Otherwise, you can enjoy our free demo version and try it for fun.

Review: Big Max 77

Experience the thrill of Big Max 77, Swintt's latest release for our passionate fruit-themed slot machine enthusiasts. Stay tuned to this page and discover all the technical details of this game, available for demo play on our site.

Game Features of Big Max 77

Big Max 77 is a 5x3 reel slot machine with 10 active paylines. The return to player (RTP) percentage seems to be quite satisfactory at 97.01%, with high volatility. It is possible to win up to 5,000 times your bet.

This adventurous slot game has a minimum bet of €0.10, but each round could require a bet up to €100, depending on the stakes at play. Judging by the game's theme and symbols appearing on its 5 reels, we can say that it is a classic fruit slot machine. However, thanks to its extra features, the music changes drastically...

Graphics, Symbols, and Special Features of Big Max 77

As we've previously mentioned, Big Max 77 is a fruit-themed slot machine designed in an old-school style that takes you back to classic slot machines in land-based casinos. The graphics are minimalist, without any additional animations that could possibly make the gameplay more dynamic and engaging.

That being said, the fruits are the real stars. Therefore, on the standard paytable of the slot, you will find cherries, oranges, grapes, lemons, plums, and watermelons. Furthermore, there is a scarlet red 7 capable of awarding the highest prize of the slot game.

The only special symbol is the Scatter, represented by a blazing flame. Scatter wins in Big Max 77 are independent of fixed paylines.

The extra feature available in this game is called Gamble, which allows you to guess the color of a card. You can play up to 10 games at the same time while waiting for Lady Luck to strike!

Frequently Asked Questions

Can I play Big Max 77 on mobile?

Certainly! Even on-the-go, there is an opportunity waiting for you using your mobile device or tablet. Thanks to technologies such as HTML5 and JavaScript, you can launch this slot machine in your mobile browser and enjoy a seamless experience wherever you go.

What is the most valuable symbol in Big Max 77?

The most valuable symbol in the Big Max 77 slot machine is the Scatter symbol, which pays regardless of fixed paylines.

Do I need to make a deposit to play this game?

Yes, but only if you're playing Big Max 77 at one of our real money casinos. Otherwise, you can enjoy our free demo version and try it for fun.

Experience the thrill of Big Max 77, Swintt's latest release for our passionate fruit-themed slot machine enthusiasts. Stay tuned to this page and discover all the technical details of this game, available for demo play on our site.

Game Features of Big Max 77

Big Max 77 is a 5x3 reel slot machine with 10 active paylines. The return to player (RTP) percentage seems to be quite satisfactory at 97.01%, with high volatility. It is possible to win up to 5,000 times your bet.

This adventurous slot game has a minimum bet of €0.10, but each round could require a bet up to €100, depending on the stakes at play. Judging by the game's theme and symbols appearing on its 5 reels, we can say that it is a classic fruit slot machine. However, thanks to its extra features, the music changes drastically...

Graphics, Symbols, and Special Features of Big Max 77

As we've previously mentioned, Big Max 77 is a fruit-themed slot machine designed in an old-school style that takes you back to classic slot machines in land-based casinos. The graphics are minimalist, without any additional animations that could possibly make the gameplay more dynamic and engaging.

That being said, the fruits are the real stars. Therefore, on the standard paytable of the slot, you will find cherries, oranges, grapes, lemons, plums, and watermelons. Furthermore, there is a scarlet red 7 capable of awarding the highest prize of the slot game.

The only special symbol is the Scatter, represented by a blazing flame. Scatter wins in Big Max 77 are independent of fixed paylines.

The extra feature available in this game is called Gamble, which allows you to guess the color of a card. You can play up to 10 games at the same time while waiting for Lady Luck to strike!

The most valuable symbol in the Big Max 77 slot machine is the Scatter symbol, which pays regardless of fixed paylines.
